name: Height Rise
description:
This game is about a slime that has to jump through platforms while surviving to the void. You have different colors to choose for your slime.

How to play: Touch the screen to jump. After jumping touch a half of the screen between left or right to slide on air.

My name is Perrihex, I am a 12 year old kid and I learned c# by myself watching videos. This is my third game ever made, but the first I publish. If the game is supported I will make some changes.

Please write about bugs you found in comments.
